mapper.select: select n.sub_menu as nodecode,n.meddle_menu as meddlemenu,n.menu_desc as menuDesc from menu n where n.sub_menu in #{AList}
mapper.insert: insert into LDMENUGRPTOMENU (MENUGRPCODE, NODECODE,MEDDLEMENU,MENUDESC, MAKEDATE, MAKETIME) values (#{menugrpcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meddlemenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{makedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into LDMENUGRPTOMENUA(MENUGRPCODE, NODECODE,MEDDLEMENU,MENUDESC, MAKEDATE, MAKETIME) values (#{menugrpcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meddlemenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{makedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

MENUGRPCODE,
NODECODE,
